sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Excuse me, could we get the dessert menu?

sentences.speaker: Lisa
sentences.sentence: Our chocolate cake is quite popular."

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: We'll have one slice of that, please."

sentences.speaker: Lisa
sentences.sentence: Absolutely, I'll get that for you right away.

expressions.desc: 대화에서 Lisa는 '바로'라는 단어를 사용하여 주문한 디저트를 즉시 가져다줄 것임을 나타냅니다.
expressions.example_en: I'll get that for you right away.

sentences.sentence: 실례합니다, 디저트 메뉴를 볼 수 있을까요?
우리의 초콜릿 케이크가 매우 인기가 있습니다."
